SEARCH
Package game.dialogue

Class DialogueManager

java.lang.Object
game.dialogue.DialogueManager
public class DialogueManager extends Object
Manages the generation and parsing of dialogues using an LLMService.

This class sends prompts to a language model and parses the returned JSON into a Dialogue object using the JsonDialogueParser.

Author:
Mohanad Al-Mansoob

      public DialogueManager(LLMService llmService, DialogueParser parser)

  • Method Details

    • generateDialogue

      public Dialogue generateDialogue(String npcPrompt) throws DialogueParsingException
      Generates a Dialogue by sending a prompt to the LLM and parsing the JSON response.

      The prompt is prefixed with instructions for the LLM to respond with JSON only.

      Parameters:
      npcPrompt - the prompt describing the dialogue scenario or NPC behavior
      Returns:
      the generated Dialogue
      Throws:
      DialogueParsingException - if the JSON response cannot be parsed correctly
